method: Cream the butter and sugar together in a bowl until well combined, then beat in the egg yolks, one at a time until fully incorporated into the mixture. Mix in the flour until the mixture comes together as a ball of dough. Tip the pastry out onto a floured work surface and knead briefly until smooth. Wrap the pastry in cling film and chill for 30 minutes. Alternatively, it can be frozen for use at a later date.
ingredients: 90g/3½oz butter, softened ,  65g/2½oz caster sugar,  3 free-range egg yolks,  200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
